    "allOrNone": true,

        {

            "referenceId": "refOrder",

                "Status": "Draft",

                "BillingCity": "San Francisco",
                "BillingState": "CA",
                "BillingPostalCode": "94105",

                "ShippingStreet": "415 Mission St",
                "ShippingCity": "San Francisco",
                "ShippingState": "CA",
                "ShippingPostalCode": "94105",

            }
        },
        {
            "method": "POST",
            "url": "/services/data/{{apiVersion}}/sobjects/AppUsageAssignment",
            "referenceId": "refAppTag",
            "body": {
                "AppUsageType": "SubscriptionManagement",
                "RecordId": "@{refOrder.id}"
            }
        },
        {
            "method": "POST",
            "url": "/services/data/{{apiVersion}}/sobjects/OrderAction",
            "referenceId": "refOrderAction",

            }
        },
        {
            "method": "POST",

            "body": {
                "Product2Id": "{{oneTimeProductId}}",
                "PricebookEntryId": "{{oneTimePriceBookEntryId}}",
                "Quantity": 10,
                "UnitPrice": "{{unitPrice}}",
                "NetUnitPrice": "{{unitPrice}}",
                "TaxTreatmentId": "{{taxTreatmentId}}",
                "ServiceDate": "{{currentdate}}",
                "OrderId": "@{refOrder.id}",
                "OrderActionId": "@{refOrderAction.id}"
            }
        },
        {
            "method": "POST",
            "url": "/services/data/{{apiVersion}}/sobjects/OrderItem",
            "referenceId": "refEvergreenOrderItem",
            "body": {
                "Product2Id": "{{evergreenProductId}}",
                "PricebookEntryId": "{{evergreenPriceBookEntryId}}",
                "Quantity": 10,
                "UnitPrice": "{{unitPrice}}",
                "NetUnitPrice": "{{unitPrice}}",
                "TaxTreatmentId": "{{taxTreatmentId}}",
                "ServiceDate": "{{currentdate}}",
                "PeriodBoundary": "Anniversary",
                "BillingFrequency2": "Monthly",
                "OrderId": "@{refOrder.id}",
                "OrderActionId": "@{refOrderAction.id}"
            }
        },
        {
            "method": "POST",
            "url": "/services/data/{{apiVersion}}/sobjects/OrderItem",
            "referenceId": "refTermedOrderItem",
            "body": {
                "Product2Id": "{{termedProductId}}",

                "OrderId": "@{refOrder.id}",

        }
    ]
}
